trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供捲軸具有滑動控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>位置對應值。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "捲軸圖例")捲軸控制項包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項組成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項及兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以增加和減少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>藉由按下捲軸控制項的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項或移動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設範圍的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性是從 0 到 1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>代表線性距離<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>捲軸的端點之間。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更預設值的範圍，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>屬性會決定是否捲軸會顯示水平或垂直方向，而且您必須定義這個屬性才會出現捲軸控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>在捲軸是導向，讓值增加，從上至下垂直捲軸或從左到右的水平捲軸。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>下表中的屬性是對應的捲軸屬性的繫結目標時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>屬性未明確定義。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果您明確地定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>屬性，繫結不存在。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性 |捲軸屬性 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 您可以存取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>使用捲軸控制項的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>有捲軸的內容方塊內，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 捲軸控制項以自訂適用於多個捲軸控制項，使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於捲軸的狀態，請參閱[捲軸樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在捲軸控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳的軸之捲動方塊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>如 DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>傳回`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>執行該命令。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>傳回`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>執行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果啟用延後捲動時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>執行的水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>當使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets IsEnabledCore to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將設定 IsEnabledCore`true`才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>大於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>值和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>已啟用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command that scrolls a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> by a small amount in the vertical direction of increasing value of its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 捲動命令<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>增加值的垂直方向移動短距離其<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This command increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This command occurs when the user presses the DOWN ARROW key.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前可見的可捲動內容量。

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: 用於 ViewportSize 單位為相同的單位，用來描述內容的長度。

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: 一些範例包括文字行或頁面的文字。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 屬性的值用來計算的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項顯示為 中滑動的值指標<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項的大小代表數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>顯示的控制項的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 25%的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項的內容就會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>所佔的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>追蹤 25%</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: 您可以決定 ViewportSize 使用的單位。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定這個屬性時，請確定 ViewportSize <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性，請使用相同的單位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>
